thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Transporter for Harvested Game (PND-4568)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Transporter for Harvested Game (PND-4568) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Transporter for Harvested Game (PND-4568)
text:
Based in Pennsylvania, InventHelp is submitting the EASY DRAG to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 09, 2015
"I am a hunter, and I constantly hear about other hunters having heart attacks in the woods while dragging their kills back to their vehicles," said an inventor from Mt. Ephraim, N.J. "I thought that there had to be a less strenuous way to transport a harvested animal."
He developed the EASY DRAG to offer a more efficient way to drag a harvested animal out of the woods. The accessory eliminates the physical stress and strain normally involved. It saves time and effort when hauling the kill to the car or truck. The design helps prevent damage to the animal's hide and fur. Also, it reduces fatigue on the hunter's legs, back, arms and shoulders. All of this is designed to enhance personal safety.
The original design was submitted to the Philadelphia office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-PND-4568, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
